errors.message:
ReferenceError: __dirname is not defined in ES module scope
This file is being treated as an ES module because it has a '.js' file extension and '/Users/Subho/eigent-chrome-extension/package.json' contains "type": "module". To treat it as a CommonJS script, rename it to use the '.cjs' file extension.
